projects.title: Azure Projects
projects.description: Space-delimited list of projects. If empty or '*' all available projects will be processed.

branch_pattern.title: Branch Name Pattern
branch_pattern.description: Regex pattern to match branch names.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: The threshold after which data should be synced.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: The number of items to retrieve per call. Corresponds to 'top' parameter in Azure DevOps API.

request_timeout.title: Request Timeout
request_timeout.description: The max time in milliseconds to wait for a request to complete (0 - no timeout).

max_retries.title: Max Number of Retries
max_retries.description: The max number of retries before giving up on retrying requests to Azure DevOps API.
